## Supported Go Versions

| Version | Supported          |
|---------|--------------------|
| <1.11   | :x:                |
| 1.11    | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.12    | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.13    | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.14    | :white_check_mark: |
